fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Murderous: Start with 4 attacking cards.
- Executioner: Gain 3 private votes during the Execution event.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Steamroll: Deal 2 HP unblockable damage to a player at the end of the phase. [2 uses, 4 CD, Unique, Night]
- Mark: Choose a player. The next attacking card to be played this phase will target them instead. [3 uses, 2 CD]
- Draw: Draw a random card immediately. [3 uses]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill X Players by the end of the Execution event. *X = (2 + Players/6, Rounded)*
